text: "Anywhere" is a dance-pop/electropop song by British singer Rita Ora, released on October 20, 2017. It is from Ora's second studio album, Phoenix. "Anywhere" is a wistful, dance-pop and electropop love song about escapism, featuring a breakdown of stuttering vocal loops. ==References== Category:2017 songs Category:Rita Ora songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Anywhere (song)
